function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive measurement of economic value of health in buildings","Impact":"Inability to prioritize and invest in building features that promote occupant health","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research to measure the economic value of health in buildings","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, data analytics, and economic valuation models","People":"Professionals, building owners, and policymakers","Owner":"Researchers and industry experts"},{"Description":"Neglect of healthy building performance during extreme events","Impact":"Vulnerability of occupants to health risks during extreme events","Mitigation":"Conduct research on building resilience and robustness under extreme events, and implement health-focused contingency plans","Technologies":"Resilient building materials, emergency response systems, and health monitoring technologies","People":"Building designers, facility managers, and emergency response teams","Owner":"Research institutions, building owners, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Disparities in health conditions based on income and race","Impact":"Unequal access to healthy living conditions and resources for underrepresented minorities","Mitigation":"Promote social justice in building design and operation, conduct targeted outreach and support programs for disadvantaged populations","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data analytics for equity assessment, and policy advocacy tools","People":"Underrepresented minority populations, advocacy groups, and policymakers","Owner":"Community organizations, advocacy groups, and government agencies"}]}
